name: Create new LionDesk contacts from Office 365 People contacts and add them to a campaign when triggered by a webhook
description: Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically create a new contact in Office 365 People and validate the email output of the webhook using ZeroBounce. If the status of the email is "valid" it will create a new contact in LionDesk and add that contact to a campaign. If the email status is "invalid" it will delete that contact from Office 365 People.
